satb.config.title: SATB Global Settings
satb.personalconfig.title: SATB Personal Settings
satb.config.unlockedmsg: Players can change the bar settings for themselves using %s. However, an operator can enable the global settings to force all players to use it.
satb.config.lockederror: I'm sorry, but the SATB Global Settings is on. Only operators can change the settings.
satb.global_config.warning: You are changing the global settings. Changes here will apply to all players.
satb.error.bugmessage: %s. THIS IS A BUG. Please contact the developer (nodenotjs) on discord and provide the following code: %s
satb.error.failedopensettingsmenu: Failed to open the settings menu
